paragraph: PÃ¥l Mathiesen (born on 14 August 1977), also known as "Athera" and "Shady Blue", is a Norwegian singer, best known as the former lead vocalist of Susperia. He is the former lead vocalist of Chrome Division and a session live vocalist in Borknagar.
In 2009, Athera suffered a heart attack which resulted in major open-heart surgery.
